channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 美国中央司令部称，胡塞武装分子对一艘装载化肥的船只发动导弹袭击，导致红海出现 "环境灾难
item.description:
The missile attack by Houthi militants on a ship carrying a cargo of fertilizer has led to an “environmental disaster” in the Red Sea, US Central Command says https://t.co/qA3wT1P3Xy

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 24, 2024

item.title: 越南警方在调查股票操纵事件后，要求起诉房地产开发商 FLC 集团前董事长和其他 50 人
item.description:
Vietnamese police are seeking prosecution of the former chairman of real estate developer FLC Group and 50 others, after a probe into stock manipulation https://t.co/HGX46cRyOh

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 24, 2024

item.title: 英国婴儿配方奶粉价格的飙升引起了人们对这一行业的关注，而生产商却希望消费者忽略这一点：它们在本质上都是一样的
item.description:
Soaring UK baby formula prices are drawing attention to an aspect of the business that producers would prefer consumers ignore: They're all fundamentally the same https://t.co/R1wAH1cvem

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 24, 2024

item.title: 陷入困境的英国公用事业公司泰晤士水务（Thames Water）即将收到一份判决书，在最坏的情况下，这份判决书可能会将该公司推向破产管理的境地。
item.description:
Embattled UK utility Thames Water is about to receive a verdict that, at worst, could push it into administration https://t.co/DilF9EWP95

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 24, 2024

item.title: 越来越多的政治家希望出售自乌克兰入侵以来被冻结的俄罗斯资产，并将所得款项汇往基辅。但银行想知道这是否合法。
item.description:
A growing number of politicians want the Russian assets - frozen since the Ukraine invasion - to be sold, with the proceeds sent to Kyiv. But banks want to know whether it's legal. https://t.co/BrYQOMea4S

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 24, 2024

item.title: 实际工资在增长，就业市场却很紧张。以下是一些确保自己加薪的专业建议
item.description:
Real wages are increasing and the jobs market is tight. Here are some expert tips to secure yourself a pay rise https://t.co/q9vxcrIxSg

item.description:
Nvidia has taken over the global stock market. What will it do next? Saturday Asia Briefing https://t.co/gyRYE45mEK

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 24, 2024

item.title: 正确：巴拿马周四举行了创纪录的债券发行仪式，今年首次利用全球债务市场在 5 月总统大选前筹集资金（更正原帖中的图片）
item.description:
Correct: Panama held a record bond offering on Thursday, tapping global debt markets for the first time this year to raise capital ahead of presidential election in May (Corrects image in original post) https://t.co/u2bWOuxOi8 pic.twitter.com/EoIe2IQcXk

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 24, 2024

item.title: - 中国大胆下调房贷利率--紧抓科技产业--香港失去新加坡枢纽地位@RChoongWilkins为您提供本周您可能错过的中国重要新闻。

- Grip on tech industry

item.title: 中国股市从全球表现最差到表现最佳的惊人逆转，激起了对中国股市将继续反弹的谨慎乐观情绪
item.description:
A stunning reversal in Chinese stocks from world’s worst to best performers is stoking cautious optimism that the rally will continue https://t.co/ZpCneFAidX

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 24, 2024

item.title: 日经 225 指数（Nikkei 225）创下 30 多年来的最高纪录，推动日本股市大涨的这股涨势似乎还将继续推进，因为外资正汹涌回流。
item.description:
The stock rally that pushed Japan’s Nikkei 225 past a record that stood for more than three decades looks set for further advances as foreigners rush back in https://t.co/F046lTgLJy

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 23, 2024

item.title: Blackstone 首席执行官 Steve Schwarzman 去年收入 8.967 亿美元，同比下降 30
item.description:
Blackstone CEO Steve Schwarzman took home $896.7 million last year, a 30% drop from a year earlier https://t.co/WI45PxS7Si

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 23, 2024

item.title: 美国对俄罗斯石油运输巨头 Sovcomflot 实施制裁，与英国和其他盟国一道，对普京规避原油出口价格上限的行为进行新一轮打击
item.description:
The US imposed sanctions on Russian oil-shipping giant Sovcomflot, joining the UK and other allies in a fresh bid to clamp down on Putin’s efforts to evade a price cap on crude exports https://t.co/K09Wg2J2se

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 23, 2024

item.title: 维托尔集团（Vitol Group）的一名前石油交易商被纽约陪审团认定犯有精心策划贿赂墨西哥和厄瓜多尔官员的罪行。
item.description:
A former Vitol Group oil trader was found guilty by a New York jury of orchestrating an elaborate scheme to bribe Mexican and Ecuadorian officials. https://t.co/DRDTe1PwiK

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 23, 2024

item.title: 在英伟达发布超预期的业绩报告后，华尔街交易员希望参与大科技股的流星式上涨
item.description:
After Nvidia smashed expectations with its blowout report, Wall Street traders want in on the meteoric Big Tech rally https://t.co/EAOM2ij0Of

item.title: 最近的一项民意调查显示，委内瑞拉的政治变革将是促使在美国的委内瑞拉移民返回祖国的最大动力。
item.description:
A political change in Venezuela would be the biggest incentive for the nation’s migrants in the US to return to their homeland, according to a recent poll https://t.co/HvwFrDHlhH

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 23, 2024

item.title: 在全世界纪念俄罗斯入侵乌克兰两年之际，美国和俄罗斯之间的紧张局势达到了近期记忆中的最高点
item.description:
As world marks the two years since Russia’s invasion of Ukraine, tensions between the US and Russia are the highest in recent memory https://t.co/kQafhpCyyp

item.title: 巴基斯坦正着手建设从伊朗输送天然气的管道

Pakistan is moving ahead to build pipeline that will transport natural gas from Iran https://t.co/fKT0BawxI2

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 23, 2024

item.title: Capital One 将以 350 亿美元的价格收购 Discover，这将使两家最大的信用卡公司合二为一，并与华尔街其他巨头展开竞争。
item.description:
Capital One is set to buy Discover in a $35 billion deal that would bring together two of the biggest credit card firms and allow them to compete with other Wall Street behemoths.@RitikaGuptaTV explains what that could mean for consumers https://t.co/YYuCIse2rT pic.twitter.com/9urEkBcLaN

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 23, 2024

item.title: 据知情人士透露，至少有一家快递公司的贷款人与该零售商进行了接洽，要求其留出一笔资金，用于支付未来可能申请破产的相关费用。
item.description:
At least one lender to Express approached the retailer to put aside a pool of money for expenses tied to a potential future bankruptcy filing, sources say https://t.co/ne1YG3KNn3

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 23, 2024

item.title: 贾斯汀-特鲁多（Justin Trudeau）总理的政府与新民主党已达成协议，将进一步推进全国药物覆盖计划，这将确保执政的自由党继续在加拿大执政。
item.description:
Prime Minister Justin Trudeau’s government and the New Democratic Party have reached a deal to move closer to a national medication coverage program, which will ensure the governing Liberals remain in power in Canada https://t.co/ZFIWXQHZbH

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 23, 2024

item.title: 国务卿安东尼-布林肯说，以色列定居点 "不符合国际法"，这给内塔尼亚胡施加了新的压力，并推翻了特朗普时代关于可以在巴勒斯坦领土上进行建设的论点。
item.description:
Secretary of State Antony Blinken said Israeli settlements are “inconsistent with international law,” putting new pressure on Netanyahu and reversing a Trump-era argument that construction in Palestinian territory could go ahead. https://t.co/d7l2i3YRxc

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 23, 2024

item.title: 周五公布的最新一轮对俄制裁针对全球数百人和实体

item.title: Binance 将支付 43 亿美元，此前法官批准了一项认罪协议，对这家全球最大的加密货币交易所处以美国历史上最大的刑事处罚之一。
item.description:
Binance will pay $4.3 billion after a judge approved a plea deal that levies one of the largest criminal penalties in US history against the world’s biggest crypto exchange https://t.co/xXSlniez5P

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 23, 2024

item.title: 美联储的研究人员最近警告说，整个行业的交易标准可能会降低
item.description:
Researchers at the Federal Reserve are the latest to warn about the possibility of lower dealmaking standards across the industry https://t.co/8EMYjL5TeR

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 23, 2024

item.title: 亿万富翁斯蒂芬-罗斯（Stephen Ross）表示，他正在寻求出售迈阿密海豚队的部分股份，因为近年来美国国家橄榄球联盟球队的价格飙升
item.description:
Billionaire Stephen Ross said he’s looking to sell a portion of the Miami Dolphins, after the price of National Football League teams surged in recent years https://t.co/vs9V2OEZAt

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 23, 2024

item.title: 在全球经济增长和风险情绪因股市宠儿英伟达（Nvidia）的大手笔盈利而得到提振之后，美元 2024 年的牛市走势有望首次遭遇周线重挫。
item.description:
The dollar’s 2024 bull-run is on track for its first weekly setback after global growth and risk sentiment got a boost from blockbuster earnings by stock-market darling Nvidia https://t.co/j6BUDn0Hh3

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 23, 2024

item.title: 散户交易的复苏使比特币价格达到了 52000 美元左右的近期高点。但目前的涨势可能正在失去动力，这种最大的加密货币将迎来一个多月以来的首个红周。
item.description:
A resurgence in retail trading has sent the price of Bitcoin to a recent high of about $52,000. But the current rally may be losing steam, with the largest cryptocurrency on track for its first red week in over a month. https://t.co/4cZGxOt8X0

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 23, 2024

item.title: 美国最大的金融咨询公司之一卡森集团已批准为客户提供四种比特币交易所交易基金
item.description:
Carson Group, one of the largest US financial advisory firms, has approved four Bitcoin ETFs for clients https://t.co/9AkwmXQrs8
